header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Christmas, family life, holiday plans, Career plans
header.activity: Mum and daughter having coffee and talking about Christmas and family life and friends
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements

speaker.fls: Spanish -- advanced; French -- intermediate; German -- beginner
